title: Does the Apple iPad Air 5 (2022) support wireless charging?
content:
Apple finally unveiled the iPad Air 5 (2022) during its Peek Performance virtual event. This 5G-enabled tablet comes with the same chassis of the previous-gen model. However, don’t let that fool you into underestimating its power. The Apple M1 chip supercharges this middle-range tablet, making it an unrivaled beast in this field. For $599 only,

The post Does the Apple iPad Air 5 (2022) support wireless charging? appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Apple revealed the iPad Air 5 (2022) during its Peek Performance event. Here's what you need to know regarding wireless charging on it.
